James returned to the secret part of the facility with the pen now in his pocket. He walks over to a middle aged woman with short blonde hair and glasses. "Well Dr. Martin?" She asks, looking like a rather annoyed librarian.

"I zapped them with our programmer as ordered, Ma'am. Whoever was wearing the skins of that poor family now believe themselves to be them. They have forgotten all details of their past lives. Within 24 hours, the skins will become their actual bodies. None of them remember the pen, as proven by the way the one in charge of them returned it to me without a problem."

"Very good. and you now have their old memories uploaded into your programmer?"

He nods. "I do. Before activating it, I scanned their minds. We now know everything about them."

"Very good. This experiment has gone on long enough. We left the remote out for someone to find so we could observe their actions and it has worked perfectly. Luckily for us, we may be able to bring in a new recruit or two to our little group to use for further tests. I trust you will go clean up the mess this experiment has made and then bring us worthy applicants?"

"I will" James says as he looks at a small screen on his programmer device. "It seems that Three people used the device in ways that would make them worthy of joining with us. Haley Landers, Adam Rowland, and Jake Masters. Adam showed the most smarts when it came to using the pen, but his original self now believes himself to be Haley Landers. She also used the device in an...interesting way, but seemed more driven by her inner desires, which were apparently brought out by use of the pen. Adam possessed her completely out of revenge at first, but then grew power hungry himself. Jake Masters is more of a wild card. He was Adam's best friend and was recruited because he has smarts just like Adam. He's currently residing inside the body of his ex girlfriend, Alli. I now have a way to contact the new Ms. Landers and will use that to see if she is worthy. If need be, I can wake up the original Adam and use him, or just find his clone. As for Jake, I'm sure, we can find a way to get to him sooner or later. This whole mess will be cleaned up before you know it."

"Excellent"

choices: Jake isn't worthy, make him think he's Alli and move on to Haley
14432123111122.content:
After a bit of consideration, James realized that there was no harm in leaving Haley and Adam for later. Haley and the rest of her family were completely oblivious to their past lives, so that mess would just clean itself up. If he did decide to go for Haley, it would be long be at their 'date' that James could arrange whenever he wanted to, since she was clearly into him. That left the Adam clone, and Jake Masters, who was currently wearing the body of his ex-girlfriend, Alli. Since he was currently the only one wearing a suit, he was the one that would have to be dealt with the fastest.

It took a bit of searching, but James finally found the supposed Alli trying on clothes a the local mall. James noticed all the outfits she had were incredibly revealing and not at all the type of clothing the original Alli would ever think of wearing. James sighed. Jake was clearly having fun, but this would raise some suspicion from the people who actually knew Alli, and was especially bad since he didn't have the pen to clean up those messes. It was careless and anyone who took any form of disguise classes would know this was a rookie mistake. But still, fun was fun and there were definitely worse things the kid could be doing with his newly acquired body.

James knocked on the changing room door, which was immediately opened by the sexy girl, who was dressed in only a black bra and thong. "Heyyyy there handsome" she said to James, licking her lips. "What brings you here?" she asked.

James decided to just go straight to the point, not wanting to waste time since he knew this girl wasn't what she appeared to be. "I know you're actually Jake Masters. Adam now believes himself to be Haley Landers and his clone has no access to the pen. Put on clothes and come with me so we can talk" he says as he sees the fear in the new Alli's eyes. She quickly shuts the door and comes out wearing a tight blue tank top and jeggings. James takes her hands and brings her to the food court of the mall so she could feel safe. "Look, I won't zap you while we're surrounded by people. After all, explaining skin suits is much harder than it has to be" he says, taking a bite of the doughnut he had bought.

"What do you want from me?" Alli asked, crossing her arms over her chest and looking at James suspiciously.

James swallowed his doughnut and took a sip from his drink before responding, "To be completely honest, I'm here to find out if you're worthy of joining a secret research and development corporation as our field tester.In other words, you'd get your own pen and be able to use it for whatever you want as long as you're reporting it to us and reporting any bugs." Hearing that made Alli smile. James could tell she'd give anything to have unlimited access to her own pen.

"And, how would you know if I'm worthy?" she asked, making a seductive face at James, who just chuckled at the attempt.

"Well, seducing me won't be the way to do it. Unfortunately for you, I'm only into real girls, not guys just wearing them" he says. "But nice try, honey. I already have a pretty good idea...."
